ayas.arabic: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًا
ayas.translation: Say (O Muhammad): It is revealed unto me that a company of the Jinn gave ear, and they said: Lo! we have heard a marvellous Qur'an,
ayas.transliteration: qul ūḥiya ilayya annahus tama`a nafarun minal jinni faqālū innā sami`nā qur-ānan `ajabā

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.arabic: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًا
ayas.translation: Which guideth unto righteousness, so we believe in it and we ascribe no partner unto our Lord.
ayas.transliteration: yahdī ilar rushdi fa-āmannā bih ۖ walan nushrika birabbinā aḥadā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةً وَلَا وَلَدًا
ayas.translation: And (we believe) that He - exalted be the glory of our Lord! - hath taken neither wife nor son,
ayas.transliteration: wa-annahu ta`ālā jaddu rabbinā mat-takhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًا
ayas.translation: And that the foolish one among us used to speak concerning Allah an atrocious lie.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna yaqūlu safīhunā `alallāhi shaṭaṭā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا
ayas.translation: And lo! we had supposed that humankind and jinn would not speak a lie concerning Allah -
ayas.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūlal-insu wal jinnu `alallāhi kadhibā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًا
ayas.translation: And indeed (O Muhammad) individuals of humankind used to invoke the protection of individuals of the jinn, so that they increased them in revolt against Allah);
ayas.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna rijālun minal-insi ya`ūdhūna birijālin minal jinni fazādūhum rahaqā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًا
ayas.translation: And indeed they supposed, even as ye suppose, that Allah would not raise anyone (from the dead) -
ayas.transliteration: wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yab`athallāhu aḥadā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًا شَدِيدًا وَشُهُبًا
ayas.translation: And (the Jinn who had listened to the Qur'an said): We had sought the heaven but had found it filled with strong warders and meteors.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annā lamasnas samā-a fawajadnāhā muli-at ḥarasan shadīdan washuhubā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْـَٔانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًا رَّصَدًا
ayas.translation: And we used to sit on places (high) therein to listen. But he who listeneth now findeth a flame in wait for him;
ayas.transliteration: wa-annā kunnā naq`udu minhā maqā`ida lissam` ۖ faman yastami`il-āna yajid lahu shihāban raṣadā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًا
ayas.translation: And we know not whether harm is boded unto all who are in the earth, or whether their Lord intendeth guidance for them.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annā lā nadrī asharrun urīda biman fil-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rashadā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًا
ayas.translation: And among us there are righteous folk and among us there are far from that. We are sects having different rules.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annā minnaṣ ṣāliḥūna wa minnā dūna dhālik ۖ kunnā ṭarā-iqa qidadā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًا
ayas.translation: And we know that we cannot escape from Allah in the earth, nor can we escape by flight.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan nu`jizallāha fil-arḍi walan nu`jizahu harabā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
ayas.translation: And when we heard the guidance, we believed therein, and whoso believeth in his Lord, he feareth neither loss nor oppression.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annā lammā sami`nal hudā āmannā bih ۖ faman yu-min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًا
ayas.translation: And there are among us some who have surrendered (to Allah) and there are among us some who are unjust. And whoso hath surrendered to Allah, such have taken the right path purposefully.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annā minnal muslimūna wa minnal qāsiṭūn ۖ faman aslama fa-ulā-ika taḥarraw rashadā

ayas.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
ayas.translation: And as for those who are unjust, they are firewood for hell.
ayas.transliteration: wa-ammal qāsiṭūna fakānū lijahannama ḥaṭabā

ayas.arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَـٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا
ayas.translation: If they (the idolaters) tread the right path, We shall give them to drink of water in abundance
ayas.transliteration: wa-allawis-taqāmū `alaṭ ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum mā-an ghadaqā

ayas.arabic: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
ayas.translation: That We may test them thereby, and whoso turneth away from the remembrance of his Lord; He will thrust him into ever-growing torment.
ayas.transliteration: linaftinahum fīh ۚ wa man yu`riḍ `an dhikri rabbihi yasluk-hu `adhāban ṣa`adā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًا
ayas.translation: And the places of worship are only for Allah, so pray not unto anyone along with Allah.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annal masājida lillāhi falā tad`ū ma`allāhi aḥadā

ayas.arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
ayas.translation: And when the slave of Allah stood up in prayer to Him, they crowded on him, almost stifling.
ayas.transliteration: wa-annahu lammā qāma `abdullāhi yad`ūhu kādū yakūnūna `alayhi libadā

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
ayas.translation: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): I pray unto Allah only, and ascribe unto Him no partner.
ayas.transliteration: qul innamā ad`ū rabbī walā ushriku bihi aḥadā

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
ayas.translation: Say: Lo! I control not hurt nor benefit for you.
ayas.transliteration: qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadā

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا
ayas.translation: Say: Lo! none can protect me from Allah, nor can I find any refuge beside Him
ayas.transliteration: qul innī lan yujīranī minallāhi aḥadun walan ajida min dūnihi multaḥadā

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغًا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
ayas.translation: (Mine is) but conveyance (of the Truth) from Allah, and His messages; and whoso disobeyeth Allah and His messenger, lo! his is fire of hell, wherein such dwell for ever.
ayas.transliteration: illā balāghan minallāhi warisālātih ۚ wa man ya`ṣillāha warasūlahu fa-inna lahu nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadā

ayas.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
ayas.translation: Till (the day) when they shall behold that which they are promised (they may doubt); but then they will know (for certain) who is weaker in allies and less in multitude.
ayas.transliteration: ḥattā idhā ra-aw mā yū`adūna fasaya`lamūna man aḍ`afu nāṣiran wa-aqallu `adadā

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا
ayas.translation: Say (O Muhammad, unto the disbelievers): I know not whether that which ye are promised is nigh, or if my Lord hath set a distant term for it.
ayas.transliteration: qul in adrī aqarībun mā tū`adūna am yaj`alu lahu rabbī amadā

ayas.arabic: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
ayas.translation: (He is) the Knower of the Unseen, and He revealeth unto none His secret,
ayas.transliteration: `ālimul ghaybi falā yuẓhiru `alā ghaybihi aḥadā

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًا
ayas.translation: Save unto every messenger whom He hath chosen, and then He maketh a guard to go before him and a guard behind him
ayas.transliteration: illā manir-taḍā min rasūlin fa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wa min khalfihi raṣadā

ayas.arabic: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا
ayas.translation: That He may know that they have indeed conveyed the messages of their Lord. He surroundeth all their doings, and He keepeth count of all things.
ayas.transliteration: liya`lama an qad ablaghū risālāti rabbihim wa-aḥāṭa bimā ladayhim wa-aḥṣā kulla shay-in `adadā
